default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: This is da Syndicate gangsta rapper. Who are you, lookin' dumb as loser? This way of life, betta play it cooler, or I'll take away all your moola...

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: An inspiration for a new song!

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Now this is fit for a star!

default.title: Level Up
default.text: The rhyme is smoother now.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Keep up with my rhythm!

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: You want to defeat me? Dream on!

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Ripppâ€”there are bound to be some mistakes in improvisation.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Drop the beat!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: This isn't hip hop at all...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: I still prefer to have a gold chain. It's easier to sell during an emergency, and you can even throw it in someone's face during a fight... I really don't know why my colleagues prefer diamonds.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: When will you give me a complete audio mixer? Right now I only have this broken tape recorder. So humiliating for a rap superstar like me!

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: I hate people who wear sunglasses indoors. Which serious rapper would do that to look cool?

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Those Eastside f*ckers disgust me. All those contract lawyers, those regulations - they just don't want to pay. I beat the boss's face to a pulp afterwards. It was awesome, hahaha.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Write a song just to diss an idiot? That would be too boring. Only your name, Chief, deserves to appear in my work.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Let's create a new label and call it "MBCC"! I'll be the founder and you can be my first signed artist! Don't tell me you can't! It's easy, I'll show you.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: I always thought that everyone outside of the Syndicate was a good-for-nothing, but you... you're the first person who wasn't born in the Syndicate that I can talk to. Come chill with me more often. I'll cover for you.

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Oh, you're here? Get me a glass of water. I've been writing songs all day and now I'm dying of thirst.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Rap isn't about flaunting wealth, so don't try too hard. Red-hot lyrics and loops are all there is to it. Inspiration is like a waterfall, the battle is not lost, and the sewers are your only way out.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Where the **** are you putting your hand? Got a death wish?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: You want a superstar like me to run errands? Are you drunk out of your wits?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Done! Aren't I amazing?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Want to hear me rap? Why else would you come... unless you're daydreaming that I'd work for you?

default.title: Deploy
default.text: The word fail doesn't exist in my dictionary.
